com.cipherlibrary

Class CaesarEncryptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cipherlibrary.Encryptor
      • com.cipherlibrary.CaesarEncryptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Encryptable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Rot13Encryptor, Rot47Encryptor

    public class CaesarEncryptor
extends Encryptor
    Represents a machine, which can encrypt or decrypt text, adding 3 to a position of a letter in an alphabet (starting from 1)
